version: Which Python version do you wish to use for analysis? (default {default_version}):
encoding: Which encoding do you wish to use for reading the file? (default {default_encoding}):

method.title: Would you like to specify functions to analyze, ones to ignore, or select all functions?

analyze: Please select the functions you wish to analyze. Leave blank to select all.
ignore: Please select the functions you wish to ignore (separated by commas). Leave blank to ignore none.
